name: dereuromark/media-embed
description: A PHP library to deal with all those media services around, parsing their URLs and embedding their audio/video content in websites.

scripts.lowest-setup: composer update --prefer-lowest --prefer-stable --prefer-dist --no-interaction && cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev dereuromark/composer-prefer-lowest && mv composer.backup composer.json
scripts.stan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan:^1.0.0 && mv composer.backup composer.json
